tool_description: Convert speech to text quickly and easily. Supports 100+ languages.

api_list.name: languages
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of supported languages for speech recognition.

api_list.name: recognize
api_list.description: Endpoint for the speech recognition process. Supports audio formats: mp3, wav, and ogg.

required_parameters.name: audio_url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the audio file to be processed.

required_parameters.name: language_code
required_parameters.description: The language code for the audio being processed.
